name: Awkward Room
description:
Awkward Room is a short kinetic novel that i made for NaNoRenO 2022 with the time i had (This last three days, haha).

It's about waiting for your turn but it would never came, or so you thought.

Accompany Cecília as she try to survive the boredom and the memory as for why she was there in the first place. 

I'm still new making games, so if you see something that i need to fix or that i can improve you can tell me :) English is not my first language so there can be some mistakes about it too.

Credits:

Photos by Gérôme Bruneau, Milad Fakurian and Дмитрий Хрусталев-Григорьев on Unsplash

Sounds by DCPoke, giddster and Bigvegie on Freesound

The drawings and story were made by me :)
